breast.transformationDescription: [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldSergalSlate(sergal)], [npc.nipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldSergalSlate(sergal milk)].
breast.crotchBoobsTransformationDescription: [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldSergalSlate(sergal)], [npc.crotchNipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldSergalSlate(sergal milk)].
